main.description: Webhook endpoint to receive age assurance events from a facilitating service. This endpoint is called by the service to report the status of the age assurance process.

name.description: The name of the event being reported, e.g., 'adult-verified'.

time.description: The timestamp of the event. Currently in ISO 8601 format, but left open for future flexibility.

orgId.description: The account identifier of our organization, in UUID format.

productId.description: The product identifier, in UUID format.

environmentId.description: The environment identifier, in UUID format.

ack.description: Whether the event was handled or not.

parentEmail.description: Misnomer: the email address of the user that was processed.

externalPayload.description: JSON string containing the external payload passed in when initiating the age assurance process.

payloadStatus.description: The status property returned on the payload.

verified.description: Whether the user was verified as an adult or not.

transactionId.description: The transaction ID of the age assurance process.
